TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StackPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo
Public Class StackPanel Inherits Panel Implements IScrollInfo
type StackPanel = class inherit Panel interface IScrollInfo
.class public auto ansi StackPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo

summary.span: 将子元素排列成水平或垂直的一行。

span.span: Arranges child elements into a single line that can be oriented horizontally or vertically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含对象的集合 ，这些对象位于 属性中。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 对于 中包含的和内容，默认值都是 stretch 。The default value is stretch for both and of content that is contained in a . 默认情况下，Panel 元素不接收焦点。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要强制 panel 元素以接收焦点，请将 属性设置为 `true` 。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. 实现 接口以支持逻辑滚动。 implements the interface to support logical scrolling. 逻辑滚动用于滚动到逻辑树中的下一个元素。Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree. 这与物理滚动相反，后者按给定方向按定义的物理增量滚动内容。This is in contrast to physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction. 如果需要物理滚动而不是逻辑滚动，请 在中包装主机元素， 并将其 属性设置为 `false` 。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host element in a and set its property to `false`.

span.span: WPF Controls Gallery Sample

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不应在代码中使用。This property is not intended to be used in your code. 它公开以实现接口协定 () 。It is exposed publicly to fulfill an interface contract (). 设置此属性不起作用。Setting this property has no effect. 如果需要物理滚动而不是逻辑滚动，请 在中包装， 并将其 属性设置为 `false` 。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来指定如何将中的元素 堆积 (某个) 的顶层。The following example shows how to use the property to specify how elements within a are stacked (one on top of the other or side by side). [!code-xaml[StackPanel_snip#StackPanelOrientationExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StackPanel_snip/CS/OrientationExample.xaml#stackpanelorientationexamplewholepage)] 下面的屏幕截图显示了此示例的呈现效果。The screenshot below shows how this example renders. ![StackPanel 方向](~/add/media/layout-stackpanelorientationexample.gif "StackPanel 方向")![StackPanel orientation](~/add/media/layout-stackpanelorientationexample.gif "StackPanel orientation")
